title: Why so many feeders and afks?
body:
I don't understand why I am experiencing so many feeders and afks in ranked. I really want to climb but whenever I FINALLY reach a promos series (not only in promos) there are feeders and afks. I can't climb as a result. I'm stuck in B3.
FYI: I'm not a noob. I'm actually a decent player.

replies.body:
If you can only play one champ/role, you're forcing your teammates onto their worse roles a lot more and they'll feed more often.

Either a) learn to play more roles so your teammates can play their best stuff ; or b) get good enough at your one champ that you can carry games with your teammates doing poorly.

A one trick pony with a 40% winrate on their main champ isn't going to climb anywhere. Getting fed every game doesn't mean anything if you can't turn that into wins, and blaming your teammates doesn't win you any games.

There is a difference between afks and feeders...
So lets deal with the first 1 afks....
How can you do anything if its 1 of the prim roles in the team make up that is afk....
So you take a pure jungler and stick him in top lane will it work no it wont.....
As to the feeders....
Why is it other players have to baby other players in this game.....
If you cant play more then 2 roles half decent don't play ranked is it that hard?

I mean the biggest issue is players get to lvl30 and think its a right to play ranked....

There should be a ratio of winning games to get in,and then only then can you clean up the user base....
Because players know they can get away with sooo much abuse on the servers its a joke...
Ive seen so many players go i dont care ive got another account to play on if i get banned is just beyond me..

I think having just 2 roles is ok. I only play jungle or support and I managed plat 2. I feel people should be able to start ranked when they want to. It only ever seems to be bronze complaining about the ranking system because they are at the bottom of the ladder.

But if those 2 roles are taken what do you do...
Not really other complain as well...
They had team builder but who wants to wait 30mins for a game.....
There is a difference of complaining of the rank system and what the player was actually talking about which had zero to do with rank....
READ what he SAID not WHAT you THINK he SAID....
this was a reply to your comment not his comment. You were stating that if u cant play more then 2 roles dont play rank. I was also saying that about 90% of people complaining are bronze

And my reply was to McRuthless....

And that I can play all roles well?

If you have a 40% winrate with Shaco you're not as good as you think you are. Sure you might be good at getting fed, but getting fed and carrying games aren't the same thing. You can be 20-0 and it means absolutely nothing if you're making poor decisions later in the game

> [{quoted}](name=McRuthless,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cYsYtV5Z,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2015-11-25T01:39:40.379+0000)

40% in ranked though...

To break even in ranked you have to basically have a winrate of 50%. To have any luck climbing you basically need a winrate of >55%. Assuming Shaco is your best champion and even assuming you got him every game, with a 40% winrate you'd be going backwards for the simple reason you are losing more games than you are winning. If you look at the people who are still gaining mmr in the upper tiers they all for the most part have ranked winrates of at least 60%. Those who are doing well have ranked winrates of upwards of 65%, and those who are still a ways off their theoretically acccurate mmr will often have winrates of about 70%.

tl;dr 40% winrate will take you down ranks not up.
